{{Lang|'''Uncle Dai'''|zh=老戴|zh_rm=Lǎo Dài}} is a quest-exclusive [[NPC]] that appears in {{Quest|No Mere Stone}}. In the Story Quest, he hires [[Kun Jun]] for geological analysis. He is one of the foremen at [[Huishan Hall]].
